CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(FlagImplants_On__c="Y", Implants_PYTD__c > 0,Implants_YTD__c <>0), ((Implants_YTD__c - Implants_PYTD__c ) / Implants_PYTD__c),
IF(AND(FlagImplants_On__c="Y", Implants_PYTD__c < 0, Implants_YTD__c <>0) , ((Implants_YTD__c - Implants_PYTD__c ) / Implants_PYTD__c * -1),
IF(AND(FlagImplants_On__c="Y", Implants_PYTD__c = 0, Implants_YTD__c <>0) , ((Implants_YTD__c)/100),
IF(AND(FlagImplants_On__c="Y", Implants_PYTD__c > 0,Implants_YTD__c =0), ((Implants_YTD__c - Implants_PYTD__c ) / Implants_PYTD__c) ,
IF(AND(FlagImplants_On__c="Y", Implants_PYTD__c < 0,Implants_YTD__c =0), 0 ,
0)))))
CustomField.label: Surgical % Change - YofY
